issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. Problem description
After modifying an Alloy project code after the first run, a red screen with Parse error is displayed.
Also, errors in the log are always displayed.

h5. Steps to reproduce
1. Create an Alloy project and run using LiveView on iOS
2. Modify a UI element (for example a label).
Result: red screen with 'parse error' is displayed and parse errors are displayed in the console log
3. Click on dismiss
Result: code is changed as expected
4. Modify again any UI element
Result: no error message screen is displayed, however errors in the log are always displayed.

Attaching screenshot and error logs.
fields.summary: LiveView: parse error displayed when modifying the code on iOS Alloy projects

comments.body: Verified fixed on Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201308091728, which includes LiveView 0.1.32.
